2025-12-09T10:38:51.3369444Z [36;1mset -euo pipefail[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3369653Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3369871Z [36;1mecho "--- 1. REGERANDO CLIENTE PRISMA ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3370161Z [36;1mnpx prisma generate[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3370355Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3370546Z [36;1mecho "--- 2. MONTAGEM DO PACOTE ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3370797Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3371002Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3371192Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3371354Z [36;1m# Copia o App Next.js[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3371587Z [36;1mcp -R .next/standalone/. deploy/[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3371820Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3372072Z [36;1m# Copia estáticos (mas vamos limpar os pesados depois)[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3372448Z [36;1mif [ -d public ]; then cp -R public deploy/public; fi[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3372769Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3373059Z [36;1mcp -R .next/static/. deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3373301Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3373571Z [36;1mcp staticwebapp.config.json deploy/staticwebapp.config.json[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3373888Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3374085Z [36;1mecho "--- 3. OTIMIZAÇÃO DO ARTEFATO ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3374722Z [36;1m# Mantemos o node_modules já empacotado pelo output "standalone" do Next.js[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3375172Z [36;1m# (ele já contém apenas as dependências necessárias em produção).[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3375602Z [36;1m# Depois removemos metadados de repositório e realizamos a poda fina.[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3376030Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/.git deploy/.github deploy/.husky deploy/.vscode[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3376333Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3376598Z [36;1m# Mantemos os binários Debian do Prisma (compatíveis com o runner do SWA)[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3377019Z [36;1m# e removemos apenas arquivos grandes ou não usados.[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3377360Z [36;1mbash scripts/prune-deploy-artifact.sh deploy[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3377627Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3377796Z [36;1mecho "--- 4. AÇÕES EXTRA ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3378045Z [36;1m# Esvaziar pasta Public da FUNCTION[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3378432Z [36;1m# (Os arquivos estáticos já foram subidos para o CDN na etapa de build padrão)[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3378898Z [36;1m# A Function não precisa dos vídeos MP4/MOV, apenas o navegador precisa.[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3379266Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mp4" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3379556Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mov" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3379835Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.jpg" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3380103Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.png" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3380341Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3380497Z [36;1m# Limpeza Geral[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3380709Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/docs[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3380921Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/logs[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3381154Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/Vitrine-De-Craques-App[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3381442Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/Vitrine-De-Craques-App-iOS[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3381685Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3381861Z [36;1mecho "--- 5. RELATÓRIO FINAL ---"[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3382121Z [36;1mecho "Tamanho Total (Meta: < 100MB):"[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3382360Z [36;1mdu -sh deploy[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3382542Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T10:38:51.3382783Z [36;1mecho "Conteúdo de @next (bins presentes no artefato final):"[0m
